content:
# 
        Dorm applications 

URL: https://akademik.agh.edu.pl/en/news/view/795
Crawled: 2025-03-20 01:12:49

According to the information on the website 
https://gov.pl/
 persons wishing to register for a temporary stay should complete the appropriate application available at 
https://www.bip.krakow.pl/uslugi
 (also available for download at dormitory Administration).

A fully completed form, signed by the person registering (an employee of the Dormitory Administration) must be submitted in person at the Administrative Center, at Powstania Warszawskiego avenue 10 (entrance from Kordylewskiego Street).

Persons who are not citizens of the European Union are required to present a visa or residence card when submitting their documents.

Applications can be submitted from Monday to Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m., on the first floor, stand 64.

Administration of MS AGH
